CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A low band - gap copolymer consisting of 9,10-thienyl-substituted anthracene ( TA ) as an electron - donating unit and diketopyrrolopyrrole ( DPP ) as an electron - withdrawing unit has been synthesized and applied to the donor material in polymer solar cells.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| 9,10-thienyl-substituted anthracene (TA) |
| diketopyrrolopyrrole (DPP) |

I have removed the term "low band-gap copolymer" as it is a property of the material rather than the name of the material itself.
